main event: A witness observed a bright light moving rapidly in the sky while walking along the Westside Highway on 6 August 1965, initially mistaking it for an airplane but noticing it traveled in an irregular path.
interesting points: The object appeared to be round and much larger than a star., It was brighter than the surrounding stars and displayed irregular movements., The witness described the object as metallic and noiseless., The sighting lasted for several minutes until the object disappeared behind some buildings., The report indicates interest in similar sightings in the area.
sighted object: a bright light that appeared round and metallic
witness description: A 15-year-old male who reported to the City Police.
